entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the morning then steady. POP 30%
